Art title 1: The Truest Thing About You Is That God Loves You
Artist Statement 1:
We wonder about our identity. Are we introvert or extrovert? Are we enneagram 6 or 4? Where do we fall on the sexuality spectrum? 

But what if the truest thing about us was something we rarely thought about, while also being the most self-defining thing in our lives.

God loves you. That is the truest thing about you. God loves you as a son or daughter. He is our father. You are so loved. You are simply wonderful to Him. 

Revel in that. That should help answer most of the questions about us.
Artist Statement 2: Do you feel tired and beaten up? It is part of all worthy journeys. Just know that you are not alone.
excerpt:
When Blue Wilson walked into Greg's office, he was surprised. Blue was desperate to the point of tears but it was Greg whose head was in his hands. 

Greg looked up, "Hey Blue!" He sniffed and wiped his eyes. "I'm always glad to see you. How'd the semester finish up?" Greg had founded this community, which some people called a cult, 25 years ago. 

"My grades were okay, I guess. Are-- are you okay?"

"Yes, I will be fine in time. It's just hard to wait sometimes." 

Blue nodded.

Greg was 65 and his wife and family had left him because they couldn't wait for the vision of this community to come together. It was finally a thriving community but Blue knew there were many businesses and gardens and eco-powered electricity systems Greg was still waiting to come together. And there were always broken people to work with who were in the hard process of becoming whole. Blue felt like one of them no...
